step1.p: Make sure you have all the necessary documents ready for your immigration. Here you will find information on what documents are needed and where to obtain them. Check your municipality's website for specific requirements. Good preparation will make your immigration process smoother.

step2.h2: Make an appointment at the municipality
step2.p: You need to make an appointment at the municipality to register your address. You can do this online or by phone. Make sure you have all the necessary documents ready for your appointment. You will need to bring these documents with you to the appointment.

step3.h2: Within 2 weeks, the neighborhood agent visits
step3.p: After you have registered your address at the municipality, a neighborhood agent will visit you within 2 weeks. The neighborhood agent will check your address and ask you some questions about your living situation. Make sure you are at home when the neighborhood agent visits.

step1.p: You need to find a place to live before you can register your address at the municipality. You can rent or buy a house or apartment. Make sure you have all the necessary documents ready for

step2.p: Once you have found a place to live, you need to sign a rental agreement with the landlord. Make sure you read the rental agreement carefully and understand all the terms and conditions. You will need to provide a copy of the rental agreement when you register your address at the municipality.

step3.h2: Register your address at the municipality
step3.p: You need to register your address at the municipality within 5 days of moving in. You can do this online or by phone. Make sure you have all the necessary documents ready for your appointment. You will need to bring these documents with you to the appointment.

step1.p: Make sure you have all the necessary documents ready for your family unification. Here you will find information on what documents are needed and where to obtain them. Check your municipality's website for specific requirements. Good preparation will make your family unification process smoother.

step2.h2: Make an appointment at the municipality
step2.p: You need to make an appointment at the municipality to apply for family unification. You can do this online or by phone. Make sure you have all the necessary documents ready for your appointment. You will need to bring these documents with you to the appointment.

step3.h2: Within 2 weeks, the neighborhood agent visits
step3.p: After you have applied for family unification at the municipality, a neighborhood agent will visit you within 2 weeks. The neighborhood agent will check your address and ask you some questions about your living situation. Make sure you are at home when the neighborhood agent visits.

step1.p: Make sure you have all the necessary documents ready for your social security application. Here you will find information on what documents are needed and where to obtain them. Check your municipality's website for specific requirements. Good preparation will make your social security application process smoother.

step2.h2: Make an appointment at the municipality
step2.p: You need to make an appointment at the municipality to apply for social security. You can do this online or by phone. Make sure you have all the necessary documents ready for your appointment. You will need to bring these documents with you to the appointment.

step3.h2: Within 2 weeks, the neighborhood agent visits
step3.p: After you have applied for social security at the municipality, a neighborhood agent will visit you within 2 weeks. The neighborhood agent will check your address and ask you some questions about your living situation. Make sure you are at home when the neighborhood agent visits.
